page.title: 07Playground Rhymes (Cont.)
page.content: {Nonsense Rhymes Many rhymes are purely nonsense rhymes showing children's enjoyment of word games and riddles eg. {One fine day in the middle of the {night, {Two dead men got up to fight, {Back to back they faced each other, {Drew their swords and shot each other. Rhymes are also said while playing ball games.Children also enjoy giggling over rhymes which mention taboo areas! { Sporting Games Catching and throwing and small sided games of our country's football and netball teams often take place on our yard and school field. {Mock Battles Many of the playground games become very rough involving fights or "wars".
